WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
Â 
when I try to Optimize my current the otimizer results have a lower value than the current set.
Example Carlos on Eredar (Eu)
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer wants to set assign Set with lower than current value

Comments.Message: I tested it now against version 2.2.0.8, 2.2.0.9 and 2.2.1 same result.

Please try to write clearly when posting here, so that we can all understand you.

If the Optimized set is lower in value than your current set, that means they not everything you're currently wearing is marked as available to the optimizer. This is not a bug.
Specifically, it looks like you have no hand enchants marked as available.

From your attached file (Carlos_current.xml) you have not defined any gems for availability to the optimizer normal nor meta... 
also you have no enchants available to the optimizer for hands nor shoulders...
NOTE: I am not a rawr developer just a user but it seems obvious to me that would probably cause your issue...
Regarding this issue, while the issue may not be a bug, would it not make sense for all currently equipped items to be considered available to the optimizer?
No, not always. In many cases, it wouldn't.
